name: Sauna
description: A humble steam room that sparks your heat economy.
flavor: The hiss of water on stone echoes through the village square.

name: Kyläkauppa
description: A general store that stocks essentials for every sauna-goer.
flavor: The shopkeeper already has a tab ready with your name.

name: Alko
description: State shelves of spirits that keep patrons spending freely.
flavor: A celebratory bottle warms more than the stove ever could.

name: Ensiapu
description: On-call medics patch up overenthusiastic bathers.
flavor: The waiting room smells faintly of eucalyptus and courage.

name: Baari
description: A lively bar that keeps crowds nearby and wallets open.
flavor: Stories flow faster than the taps on karaoke night.

name: Cittari
description: A sprawling market that draws shoppers from every village.
flavor: You can buy birch whisks, groceries, and gossip in one trip.

name: Säteri
description: Luxury estates where wealthy guests pay for prestige sessions.
flavor: Marble paths lead to private steam with unobstructed views.

name: Kasino
description: High-stakes entertainment that funnels winnings into heat.
flavor: The roulette wheel spins in perfect rhythm with the löyly.

name: Kirkko
description: A sacred hall where blessings boost community attendance.
flavor: Candles flicker, mixing incense with the scent of pine.

name: Vankila
description: Mandatory sessions ensure inmates contribute steady heat.
flavor: The guards swear the steam keeps tempers in check.

name: Bordelli
description: An illicit lounge where exclusivity commands a premium.
flavor: Whispers of secret suites lure even the stoic inside.

name: Kampus
description: A modern campus researching efficient steam technology.
flavor: Students argue about thermodynamics between sauna rounds.

name: Tehdas
description: Industrial complexes that automate löyly generation.
flavor: Giant turbines roar like waterfalls made of heat.

name: Parlamenttitalo
description: Political clout delivers subsidies and devoted supporters.
flavor: Sauna diplomacy keeps debates steamy but productive.

name: TätäEiMissäänNimessäPitäisiNähdä!
description: A debug structure that only appears during development.
flavor: If you see this, reality has sprung a leak.
